FuncDef: This command defines the type-1 route-distinguisher ipv4 address and community value range within which the system will select a route-distinguisher for the bgp-enabled services using auto-rd.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv4 address used in the first 4 octets of all the type-1 auto route-distinguishers selected by the system.
Specifies the community value of the type-1 auto route-distinguisher. Values-1 to 65535.
